title: Actor Adam Driver on Bringing Theater to the Military (Audio)
itunes:title: Actor Adam Driver on Bringing Theater to the Military (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Actor and former marine, Adam Driver (Star Wars, Girls), is also the Founder of Arts in the Armed Forces (AITAF), which brings the best modern American theater to the military free of charge.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
